mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REPORT ( REPORTID, REPORTERID, REPORTEDNAME, REASON, REPORTEDAT ) VALUES ( SEQ_REPORT_ID.NEXTVAL, #{reporterId}, #{reportedName}, #{reason}, SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT r.REPORTID, r.REPORTERID, r.REPORTEDNAME, r.REASON, r.REPORTEDAT, u.NICKNAME as REPORTEDNICKNAME FROM REPORT r LEFT JOIN USER_INFO u ON r.REPORTEDNAME = u.USERNAME WHERE r.REPORTERID = #{reporterId} ORDER BY r.REPORTEDAT DESC
